name: a 10 Second life
description:
A life played out in 10 seconds. How far can you get? How close to your goals will you end up?

'A 10 second life' was made for a 1 game 1 week rapid prototyping class, with the weeks theme of '10 seconds'. Basically a game had to be made that was played through in full in 10 seconds.

Please enjoy, and feel free to leave any feedback you might have.
